name: Ishita
greetingText: I really like your jhumkas Yesterday btw!
wishText: May your toe be nice to you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you mam!! Have a great Day ahead blah blah blah blah!!
text2: I was about to send generalised wish to unique girl

outroText: An effort to have another english vali tareef
replayText: And this time I will ask you the meaning.
